Co-creating wonder with startup companies. Coplex was launched in 2000. Grew to become an award-winning multi-million dollar agency. The company shifted its focus to become an interactive startup studio with offices in Phoenix, Los Angeles & Seattle.Some highlights: - Award-winning multi-million dollar interactive agency- In business for 15+ years, launched in 2000- Inc 500/5000 Fastest-Growing Private Company, 3 years in a row

Changing the way people interact in the society. Feel Free is a geo-location social networking app incasing face-to-face interactions in local spaces.-Raised 10k in pre-seed money pitch competition events.-Got accepted to ASU Edson Incubation program. -Got accepted to top incubator in Phoenix "SEED SPOT" - pitched to an audience of 1000 people after 13 weeks of intensive work on business model canvas.-Designed and implemented multiple tests to validate business assumptions. Later we built the product based on costumer feedback-Managed interns from Thunderbird School of Global Management to build our pricing model.-Managed senior undergraduate interns from ASU Computer Science program to build our Android app.-Became a certified Scrum Product Owner  - Applied lean and agile methodologies to build Feel Free's iOS app. We gained 1k users in 2 weeks with no marketing efforts. -Established relationships with multiple coffee shops - piloted our "Feel Free Space" program with 3 local coffee shops and increased their sales.-Social Media marketing - ran multiple campaigns on numerous social media platforms which led to 8k (mostly organic) followers.-I encountered co-founder conflict and gave full ownership to my former partner.

Wasabi Ventures created the Wasabi Ventures Academy to give individuals a first-hand experience in the start-up and venture capital world. The Wasabi Ventures Academy is an entrepreneur's guide through the start-up universe. Focused around the individual, this revolutionary program leverages the vast network at Wasabi Ventures, as well as fundamental lessons that build successful individuals and start-ups.

Terry is an outward focused mentor with an incredible ability to analyze information and give constructive feedback. A financial advisor and a genius CFO. Terry was my mentor at a local incubator and I received advice weekly. He is generous when it comes to sharing his intelligence and wisdom. If you are a business owner, then just have a one on one meeting with, you'll gain new insight on your financial model. I guarantee that.
